website_summaries.verdict: Fun tie-dye effect in 4 color options will make any kid excited to swim.
pros: Double strap in the back holds its place
Soft silicon gaskets and UVA- and UVB-protected lenses
cons: The one-piece design means loosening the straps each time to remove the goggles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, even for a goggle snob!
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect fit for my 5 year old (with a huge head). They worked PERFECTLY (and my kids are goggle snobs). Great quality for the money! I got three pairs, one of each color and they fit my kids (ages 5, 7, and 9) perfectly. UPDATE: We have a pool and my kids have been usually these daily and for the past 2 months straight and they are still in perfect condition. They've even left them outside in the sun for a day or two and in the chlorine water overnight(s). My 9 year-old daughter used these exclusively for her competitive swim team (practice 5 days a week plus weekly meets) and they never failed her.
customer_reviews.author: The Harris Family

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these at the beginning of summer as an extra pair of goggles in case my daughter lost hers.... I opened them at the pool and about 1 he into swimming my daughter went to put them on and they snapped in half..... I’m pretty sure they were really old when we got them and maybe that’s why they broke so quickly! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Biles

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust. Perfect fit for my 5-6 year old daughter. These goggles are also durable. We use these several times a week and they are still going strong after almost 9 months. One star off because they do tend to fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Jess D.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give them one star because this is our second pair. The first pair worked out well. Didn't fall off during race starts like the Speedo Jr vanquisher did. But this pair lasted about 3 weeks before the strap broke. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboys Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cool color and Tyr quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. They don't leak or og. My kiddo loves them. They are worn 4-6 hrs per week for swim practice. Fits 8 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: S.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s have been swimming weekly for years. We also have a pool in our backyard so we go through lots of goggles. These TYR Youth Goggles are great! Minimal leaks and fogging, even for my 5 year old who constantly lifts the goggles up and down throughout her lessons. I also love how the materials used in making them meet all US standards and don’t have scary or unknown chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: akkeber

customer_reviews.title: I bought three and all three are of the same quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my three children! I purchased the green and orange color combination and bought three for my kids so they wouldn’t fight over a sibling having theirs (which I knew is what would happen if I purchased three different colors for them!) Of the three, they all are of same quality and all three have worked wonderfully for days at the beach and pool. These goggles fit my 7, 4, and 2 year old. My husband has also managed to get them around his head at the merry age of 31. Wonderful product, will only buy this brand in the future for goggles. Have had other brands and they didn’t last like these do.
customer_reviews.author: emilysuddath

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable goggles for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter is on the summer swim team and loves these goggles. This brand was highly recommended by the local swim shop. They are comfortable and easy for her to adjust. I purchased two, one clear pair for evening swim meets and one blue tint for swim practice and all other swimming in the daytime sun. They stay on well which is important when diving off the block. The fun coloring also makes them easy to identify. And most importantly they are more affordable to replace than some higher prices brands we have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane H.

customer_reviews.title: Great performer, Good looking, affordable
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves his new googles, he’s been using them for a couple of months already, great quality for the price. The only thing you might want to double check is the suction power, my 4yo takes 30min swimming lessons and at the end of the class, when he takes out the googles, you can see a little mark on his face, I’m guessing suction power is too strong? But he says it doesn’t hurt or bother him in any form, you’re just able to see a little marking
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Moncayo C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10-Year-Old Swimmer
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year old swims competitively and she owns 2 pairs of these goggles, they don't fog for her and they keep water out. She has used many other brands and sizes and these work best for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M-R

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old.  SKIP THE CHEAP ONES!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4. These are SO much better than the cheap drug store ones. The key is the double strap in the back. Once her hair is wet the straps keep the goggles in place and the back strap doesn't slide down and crush her ears. She will not swim without these now. Also very durable and don't fog up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these goggles for our (then) 6 year old, mainly for swim lessons and also for over the summer at the pool, and the strap BROKE less than 3-4 months after purchasing them, (and probably less than 12 times in the water). Incredibly disappointed as TYR is a good brand and the goggles had gotten good reviews. No other complaints on the goggles apart from them breaking so soon. If you're looking for durable kids' goggles that will last a while, I'd recommend you reconsider these. (We bought our younger daughters' Speedo goggles around the same time and she still has and uses hers, so I'll probably be buying those instead.)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Riordan

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only purchased one pair of goggles this summer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all different store brands, including Speedo, and I felt like I was always going back to try something new! A swim mom suggested these to me, and they are amazing!!!! My twins take care of these and keep track of them at all times. I do believe it is because they know they make swimming easier for them! They are never without them in the water. Best goggle I’ve found!
customer_reviews.author: 🧩

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors. Uncomfortable fit for large kid eyes
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these because of the colors, but they're really too small for his eyes. Because of that it sort of hurts me to watch him use them. They do, however, have pretty good suction and I haven't seen them fog on him. They've fogged on me when I've tried them and I found them awkwardly sized as well (too small) and uncomfortable, but they seem to work okay for him for brief submersion. They're okay, he likes them, but I wish I'd gotten a panoramic-style pair where the eyes share one big window.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable  Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: We got these googles and are so impressed! My son says they are more comfortable than his other pair and I think they are adorable. They work extremely well and of good quality. They also shipped very quickly, but the best part to me was the personal letter from the seller. I like supporting small business from third party sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible face stingers
customer_reviews.text: Terrible face stingers!!! We bought three different brands for each of my children and the daughter who got these really lost out. She complained of the burning and I thought she just wanted her sister's goggles, until I tried them on. They stung the skin around the eye on 4 of 4 of us who wore them!! Don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: cass

customer_reviews.title: The only one my little swimmers will wear
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several different kids googles and these area the only ones my girls will wear without complaints. The others have either leaked excessively or the lens portion has fallen out. My 6 and 8 year old girls tried swim team this year and these are the only goggles they would wear. This is our fourth pair and we will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vickylynnm

customer_reviews.title: She loves these
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews before buying these, and normally I would have been a bit worried, but I have bought these in the store previously and had no problem. As before, these are perfect. She loves the color and they fit great. She has not had any problems with them leaking or breaking. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a quick purchase for a first-time swim class. They lasted 4 years before I had to buy another only because the lenses were scratched up. They don't leak (and we have tried others) and fit comfortably. My daughter won't wear another brand. Great Value! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Great kids' goggles
customer_reviews.text: We don't use anything except these TYR Swimple goggles for our young kids on the swim team. Good fit, easy to adjust. Definitely recommend for young kids in competitive swimming, and of course they are also fine for leisure swimming.
customer_reviews.author: coloradddo

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Design
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like the style/fit of these goggles. We’ve had different colors over the years because they get lost, but it’s always this TYR. I like the head as it helps the goggles stay in place. Additionally, they aren’t a complete pain to size-adjust. When buying, don’t forget to consider the color of the lens. My kids thought the blue was “too sad” to look through. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Goggles my kid will actually wear!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves opening her eyes underwater, but hates wearing goggles. Until I found these. They are so easy to keep on, adjust, and they stay put and do not leak! If your kid has a hard time with goggles all the time, give these a try. I ended up buying several pairs because of how well they worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: captainjillian

customer_reviews.title: Great, all around goggles
customer_reviews.text: As a veteran year round swim Mom of 15 years, I can say with ease that these goggles are by far my favorite and my kids’s favorite. They last several seasons and they hold up to the abuse of my boys. They stay on off the blocks and they don’t fog up. They adjust so much more easily than any other option out there aside from switching out the bands. They’re great goggles for those just learning or for those who swim competitively.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles for small framed kids
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite goggles for my 7 year old. He has a smaller frame and needs goggles that aren't so wide at the bridge. He is on our local team and they work very well in terms of comfort. They don't leak, stay on well and don't fog up all the time like alot of other ones. We've been ordering these for about 3 years as they are the favorite. I wish my son would keep track of them more often though. They aren't the cheapest goggles on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who has swim lessons. The goggle worked fine in the beginning, but after awhile she was complaining about water getting into one side of the goggles. We tried to tighten up the straps, but water seemed to get in on one side. Was disappointed in these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: slam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent goggles for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goggles for the price. I've ordered several of these as my kids lose them, but my kids specifically request that I buy this brand again as they are their favorites. The kids like the fun tie-dye colors, good fit (doesn't leak), and easy adjustment. I've never had one break, just keep losing them.
customer_reviews.author: geep

customer_reviews.title: Love these goggles for my kids
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect fit for my 4 year old son. They stay on his face without slipping down even when going under water. My daughter has been wearing the pink version of these also. Even at 6 years old a perfect fit for her as well.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMommy

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Love These Goggles
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair (a blue pair for my son and these for my daughter) that I purchased. My two-year old daughter loves wearing these goggles to swimming lessons and it gives her confidence when going under water. They're comfortable enough that she wears them for the whole class and she doesn't get water in her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Swim instructor recommend 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Best kids Google's! As a swim instructor these are always my recommendation! With my own kids and my students these are the best Google's we've come across for their ages/sizes (3year olds -8year olds)
customer_reviews.author: Eva_NewLife

customer_reviews.title: Easy on & off, keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is in swim lessons and needed a quality pair of goggles that is easy for her to put on & adjust herself without help. These goggles are easy for her to slide in & off & she says they keep water out of her eyes & the suction cups work to keep the water out. They are a fun color & do not fog up. I recommend this goggle for young swimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old with big head!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son has a LARGE head (99th percentile) and these fit great! They're adjustable and would fit a bigger kid as well, but I liked that they fit his eye placement and large head, and I like the dual straps. These were specifically recommended by his swimming teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these. They all didn’t last more than a couple of weeks before the silicon between the eyes have way. All three pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Effective Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys almost suck your eyeballs out. That is hyperbole, of course. That is actually a compliment to the product. I appreciate the fact that when I go under water, or my kids go under water, it is a clear experience, without the hassle of leakage and water obstructing our vision while fully submerged. Made of quality materials. If these ever become defective, I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles for toddlers and learn-to-swim kids
customer_reviews.text: As a lifelong competitive swimmer, it was important to me to find good quality goggles for my kids. These fit really well around the small eye sockets, are relatively easy to adjust and fit well around the head (including around little ponytails). My girls can now put them on themselves too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Scratch easily
customer_reviews.text: These scratch very easily. I bought two pairs and both are all scratched up only 4 months into it. I bought them last year but the kids just started using them recently.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. No fogging
customer_reviews.text: Love these. This is our 4th pair between 2 kids. They hold up for around 9 months of 2-3x’s a week use. Little to no fogging up. Fits well for my kids who are 4 and 6 with big heads. The youngest started wearing them at 2.5.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyane D.

customer_reviews.title: Room to grow
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these. She uses them for swim lessons and they work well for her. She’s a petite 6 year old and they are the perfect size. Still room for growth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Daughters Favorite
customer_reviews.text: We have a number of different goggles, but these are always my daughter go to favorite. She says they are the only ones that don't leak on her. She's 9.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Good swim goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are good swim goggles. My 10 yo uses them and finds them to be comfortable. They dont fog up and can be adjusted. Our swim coach advised us to get goggles with a split elastic ( which this has). One part of the band goes over the pony tail at the back of the head and another under it keeping the goggles snug and in place while swimming. The bridge fits well and keeps water out.
customer_reviews.author: Transitions

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Used 3x and broke just putting on my child 2 days after return window closed. We do swim team so I know how to put on goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little swimmers
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old absolutely loves these goggles. Purchased for a 6 year olds birthday at the pool. No leaks, no fog up, definitely helped with being confident in the water. My only hope would be for a small carry case.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyKunk

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing these for a couple months now during his weekly swim lessons and they are holding up well. Edit- 04/19/2020 have had these for over a year now and they are still holding up just fine. My son uses them a couple times per month for swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Taolan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Have held up great for swim lessons and bathtimes. My (somewhat picky) 5 year old daughter says they’re comfortable and wears them without a fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my four year old. She has been taking lessons in them and she will keep them on because they are comfortable. Very adjustable too! They do leak a tiny bit of water into the lens but better than most goggles for kids. Will definitely consider buying them for our almost two year old too. Super cute tye dye design also!
customer_reviews.author: The D's

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a five year old.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5 year old daughter's face very well. She's small for her age - finding goggles that didn't leak was a challenge. Bought three pairs of these.
customer_reviews.author: Triptyx

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke on these VERY quickly. The suction and fit are great. The fit of these were great for a 10 year old. Wish they didn't break so easily!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Kids googles
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old daughter loves these! Great fit for a girl with a big head. They lasted all summer during camp, so I’m sure they got thrown around a lot. And since the summer has been swimming 1-2x a week she gets a lot of use for them. Great job at keeping the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: After wasting money on multiple glasses, finally found the right fit for my daughter. Plain and simple and keeps away water coming to eyes. The dual band is durable and helps to keep the glass in place. Using this for 4 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Ayan

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are the first goggles that have actually worked for an entire summer for my kid. They fit correctly, have great suction. We will be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect goggles! Work awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 4 year old who is the biggest critic. He loves these and feels comfortable going under water now. They are not tight either where they mark his face. He is happy with these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great specs
customer_reviews.text: My child is soooo picky about her goggles. These stayed on well, had great suction, no leakage, and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MamaKD

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and good price
customer_reviews.text: They look very sturdy the suction around the eyes seems good. These were bought for my 8 year old and they haven't been worn in the pool yet but they are comfortable and adjustable which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy A

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: My kids swim competitively and these goggles are the best! No issues with them staying on during starts, they don't leak, and the strap is tough! Finally a pair my kids actually like!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. Works great during his swimming lessons and also just for playtime. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: nozcan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for little kids!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, straightforward, easy to use with my 3-year-old who has never worn goggles before. He loves them. The colors are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: RosieChics

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim lessons!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, each for my daughters 8 & 5 for their summer swim lessons at the YMCA. Both fit great, high quality, and cute colors! I know they will last a long time because they don't get water in them!
customer_reviews.author: strwbry_xoxo42

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids and several pairs of this same goggle. The last pair had a lower strap that broke. First negative with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very configurable
customer_reviews.text: Very configurable. My daughter tried so many brands and models, and these are very comfortable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Raghuram

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles for kids. The ridges on the sides lock them in place. Other brands kept slipping out
customer_reviews.author: Francesco Guarino

customer_reviews.title: No problems and we use them everyday.
customer_reviews.text: My kids have tried many types of googles and these seem to work. Seemed a lil’ high for kids googles but I guess you get what you pay for because all my cheap ones are useless.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with strap design
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these goggles for 7, 10 and 11 year olds with average head size. The straps tend fall just behind the top of the ear with an edge rubbing the ears. Holds water out well but the straps are uncomfortable around the ear area.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: super nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Box came broken, so I return them because supposed to be a gift. They looked super nice though, and I really liked the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent goggles. They fit my 11-year-old daughter well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goggles. They fit my 11-year-old daughter well and seal properly. The colors look great. They are easy to see out of as well. I have had my TYR goggles for 12 years and they still work perfectly so am a big fan of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: owsinsomnia

customer_reviews.title: These are the best youth goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are the best youth goggles. My son swims year round on a swim team. He used a pair for almost a year and a half with no fuss at all. No struggle over adjusting the straps. He loved the fit. They do no come off when he dives. He would still be using those, but the strap broke during some ill advised horse play with his brother in which they stretched them out too far. We bought this identical pair and he is back in business. He won't swim with any other kind of goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The goggles are great but only if you are going to the pool for some fun, after a while they start to get foggy. They don't leak! The material is very resistent and they look cool, the design is great!
customer_reviews.author: Obed V.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old and she loves them! Great quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 year old, they fit great and has room to grown into them. We have been using them for about 3 months
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: My kids have used this brand and style of goggles ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids have used this brand and style of goggles for recreation swimming for several years now. They seem to fit well from ages 4 to 9 so far. I keep several pairs for both indoor and outdoor use. This particular model advertises uv coating, but we have other pairs of the same model with darker shading. This pair would probably work for either indoor or outdoor if you didn't have multiple pairs. They seem to hold up well. Occasionally, we will need to replace a pair due to damage or loss.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Dungan

customer_reviews.title: Great Googles For Swim Team
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of googles for my daughter to use at swim meets. While they will eventually stretch out (after about 3 months for her with swim practice 3x a week for 2 hours), the price is so great it doesn't matter. And she loves the tie-dyed effect to make her stand out!
customer_reviews.author: GK95

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for my 4.5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles, got for me 4.5 year old for swim class. Very easy to adjust as compared to other goggles. She really loves them and I know they will last for a while. She easily put them on and off herself and they stay on the entire class (she wears with a swim cap)
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: great color, easy to spot my son while he's ...
customer_reviews.text: great color, easy to spot my son while he's swimming. They don't leak, but after a while he says that his eyes hurt. I bought a different pair that fit him better, the frame is a little bigger and they are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kid fit
customer_reviews.text: There are so many cheap quality goggles out there. These goggles were recommended by a friend. Both my son and daughter wear these for their weekly swim lessons. The don’t complain of their hair pulling, skin irritated, or water in their eyes. Well worth the $10!
customer_reviews.author: Tfran

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and stay in place
customer_reviews.text: My 7year old uses these for her competitive swim team and they work great. The bright colors help me find her in a crowd of swimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martinelli

customer_reviews.title: Great kids goggles!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love these goggles! Bought for my 7 and 5 year old, and have bought them over and over in different colors. Easy to adjust and do a good job keeping water out.
customer_reviews.author: M.Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them... so did some other kid, cause they didn’t come home from camp. :(
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and design
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how the fit! I will definitely buy more of them. It was a great investment
customer_reviews.author: Alberth Chacón

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Prettier colors than pictured (blue and pink). My experienced little swimmer was thrilled by the fact they don't get fogged like most others!!!
customer_reviews.author: anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles and fun colors
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of goggles for our 2 year old. He has been putting them on himself or asking for help since he was one, just around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: No leaking
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for 3 and 7 year old. Fits perfect without leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to adjust but durable for class
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loves the fun color/design. Adjustable but not the easiest to do. Fits my 3 year old great and is perfect for class.
customer_reviews.author: DoublehapaFAM

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well
customer_reviews.text: The last pair we used the head strap wouldn't hold it's tightness level. This one doesn't slip and has laster for almost a year with 3 times a week use. Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nobers

customer_reviews.title: Nice swimming goggles
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and my grandson seems to like them. The blue tint he likes and they keep the water out of his eyes and do not leak. He is 6 years old and they fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lisa cardon

customer_reviews.title: My six-year-old loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Our six-year-old loves these and wears them every time he swims! They fit perfectly and do not leak. They came quickly and were package securely. Probably gonna order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: CSP

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his goggles, the rubber unfortunately has started to crack and I would expect this if they were left out in the sun. So far it does not seem too let water in, but I can only imagine it will start to seep in soonZ
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Child's Swimming Goggles
customer_reviews.text: We bought these along with the Green Frog goggles that Amazon offered. These are somewhat better than the other goggles in keeping water out of her eyes, but since she loves anything green, these are not her favorite. No matter, anything that Julie likes is great to us.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, but side cracked after 2months of use. First tyr pair, have had speedo previously and will likely returncto them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leak and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles for us- they don’t leak and are comfy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves these they fit her great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam latshaw

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: We really struggled with these. They would never tighten around my child's head. The adjustment kept popping loose even before my child could even get in the water. I'm guessing we got a broken return item. There are better options elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fit well but be careful they bleed color
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girls. They fit nicely and they don’t complain about water getting in. My main issue is that they bled color on their swim suits when both were throw in the swim bag wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wahlman

customer_reviews.title: Great and good for adjusting.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter has a small had and struggles to find a pair of goggles that she likes. She's on a swim team and she loves these. Doesn't let water in. She doesn't complain anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles. These fit my 2 and 4 year old Perfectly! They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Oake

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these goggles more than any others... including Speedo! Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Jochim

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first day
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even make it into the pool. I, the mom, broke these while trying to tighten the strap. Not satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Angoraknitter

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing these goggles For awhile. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these twice weekly for 2.5 months for swimming lessons for my almost 4 year old and he loves them! Holding up great, fit well, and the bright color (green and orange) makes them easy to spot in the water and in my bag. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K Kennaugh

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by his swim instructor
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3.5 year old very well. Recommended by his swim instructor.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Morgan

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite goggles for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite goggles for my 3 year old! The goggles are a little small for my 6 and 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for little swimmers! Tight, don't leak and cute colors! Love TYR
customer_reviews.author: ela

customer_reviews.title: They don't leak!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves them. They don't leak, and we go swimming all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Walker

product_meta.title: TYR Youth Tie Dye Swimple Goggles
product_meta.description: Swimples kids goggles feature optical grade, polycarbonate lenses with anti-fog and UV protection, a secure release button for quick and easy strap adjustment and a small, unibody frame to accommodate various facial types. TYR youth goggles are so easy to use that your kids will be able to get the perfect fit all by themselves. All TYR kids goggles have been tested and approved in accordance with the Consumer Product Safety Commission's guidelines. It's never too early for excellence.
feature_bullets: Made using the highest quality materials
Tested to give you the edge in all your activities
Used by both professional and recreational users
